subject: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Commissioner David Stern’s endorsement of microphones sidestepped what the Knicks are believed to have done, which was to use these ultrasensitive microphones for their own benefit.
snippet: Commissioner David Stern’s endorsement of microphones sidestepped what the Knicks are believed to have done, which was to use these ultrasensitive microphones for their own benefit.
